title: Vodafone boss Nick Read is dialling the changes but could get hung up on debt
text:
It has been a baptism of fire for Nick Read since taking over as Vodafone boss last year. Still, no one can accuse him of dragging his feet.

He’s made a series of tough decisions, not least cutting the cherished dividend for the first time in three decades. Its giant masts business has also been put on the block in a bid to raise cash. Both were smart moves. Vodafone is creaking under tens of billions in debt, a mighty hangover from the expansionary years of predecessor Vittorio Colao.
